title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Avoid the instinct to fight fire with fire. You might not turn the other cheek if a stranger or friend is unkind to you today, but theres no reason to punch back with a wallop of your own. The excitable Aries Moons conjunction with anguished Chiron suggests that another person is lashing out from a pain that has little to do with you. Exercise compassion and give others room to be human without assuming responsibility for their troubles. Author Don Miguel Ruiz wrote, Don't take anything personally. What others say and do is a projection of their own reality, their own dream. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
